channel.title: Allstar Client
channel.description:
Anyone here experienced enough with older clients? Atm I'm using a shitty stabbingscape client but am open to change.
If someone can instruct me on how to properly jar it with a working cache downloader that's be jus great. I need to eventually make a webclient but anything but Java isn't my cup of tea ;D
Thanks for any help.
